name: Life at Qerja
description: Established in April 2014, Qerja is the first online community portal in Indonesia which provides information about salary and work environment in various companies in Indonesia and Malaysia. With a captive audience of users seeking insider information about companies across Indonesia and Malaysia, the stage was set to offer a more direct outlet for those who found themselves underemployed or simply curious about a career change. In Qerja, which had grown to more than 100 employees in one year, we work together in modern work culture and always strive to set the new standard in working climate experiences for our valued employees. We value ourselves on the amazing team we’ve built. Our culture is one of our most important assets and we always ensure the talents we assembly embody our values.
features: We always try to be the best version of ourselves.
We have experience to learn and always get better.
We always give someone the strength to be themselves.

Highlights.name: HR Solutions Provider
Highlights.description: This is a website about a company named PT Qerja Manfaat Bangsa. The company offers human resource solutions including job portals, executive headhunters and online training.

Highlights.name: Acquisition and Growth
Highlights.description: The company was founded in 2007 and acquired Karir.com, the first job portal in Indonesia, in 2019. This acquisition signifies a significant growth for the company.

Highlights.name: Large Client and User Base
Highlights.description: PT Qerja Manfaat Bangsa has a large client and user base with 50,000 clients and 8 million users. This indicates their strong presence in the HR solutions market.

enhanced_description: Life at Qerja, established in April 2014 by PT Qerja Manfaat Bangsa, is the first online community portal in Indonesia dedicated to providing transparent information about salary benchmarks and work environments within various companies across Indonesia and Malaysia. It serves a significant user base of 8 million, offering a direct resource for individuals seeking career changes or feeling underemployed by providing valuable insider company insights. As part of PT Qerja Manfaat Bangsa's broader human resource ecosystem, which includes job portals (such as Karir.com, acquired in 2019), executive headhunters, and online training, Life at Qerja plays a crucial role in talent attraction and employer branding for its 50,000 clients. The platform also reflects Qerja's commitment to a modern work culture and positive employee experiences, emphasizing the value of its own team and cultural assets.
